item.title: Stock and Watson (2007) in pymc3 and Stan
item.description: This file is available as Jupyter Notebook. The STOCK_2007 model inflation as an unobserved components models: \begin{eqnarray} \pi_t &=& \tau_t + \eta_t \\\ \tau_t &=& \tau_{t-1} + \epsilon_t \end{eqnarray} where \(\eta_t\) and \(\epsilon_t\) are independently and identically distributed with mean 0 and variances \(\sigma_\eta^2\) and \(\sigma_\epsilon^2\). A Replication First we start by importing some standard libraries. %matplotlib inline import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import pandas as p Next we get the data used and plot it.
